text.p: You spend a first fruitless day looking for a place with this name. After this, for every day that passes, you can roll one die. When you roll a 5 or 6, you can continue. If you wish, you can increase the number rolled on the die by 1 by spending a point of Luck. If you tire of this, you can try looking for a person named Endimion or ask questions about the grey-robed men, if you haven't already done this.
